Source: within.js

/**
 * Check if x and y are within the bounds.
 * Only checks against edges specified in the values parameter
 * 
 * @param {number} x 
 * @param {number} y 
 * @param {object<string,number>} values Works with boundingClientRect
 * @returns {boolean}
 */

var within = function(x=0, y=0, values={left:0,right:0,top:0, bottom:0}){
    let output = false;

    let tests = {
        left:   x >= values.left,
        right:  x <= values.right,
        top:    y >= values.top,
        bottom: y <= values.bottom
    }

    let presentTests = []

    Object.keys(values).forEach((index)=>{
        if(index in tests){
            presentTests.push(tests[index]);
        }
    })

    return presentTests.every(value=>value===true);

}

// module.exports = within;

export { within }
